history.narrative: Law 3-80 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-74, which was referred to the Committee on Public Safety and Consumer Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 22, 1980 and May 6, 1980, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 23, 1980, it was assigned Act No. 3-191 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
